name: Dinner Party VR
description:
[PLAYABLE WITH HTC VIVE]

Dinner Party VR was a half semester long project AET 339 Virtual Reality For Games at The University of Texas at Austin. You play as a dinner host where you must impress your date by cooking dinner and cleaning up your house before they arrive. Depending on how much you clean and whether you were able to serve dinner will determine whether you please your date or get dumped. There is a timed mode as well as an untimed mode available.

Controls:

  • Press/Release trackpad to teleport
  • Grab/Interact with back trigger

The Team:

Amber Smith - Programmer

Basilio Bazan - Art

Opal Bunnag - Designer/Sound
